posts.post_title: Old Judge Sage and Van Dyke PSA 8 Two Player Cardfor Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Kasarda
This card is one of a kind.  It is the tough Toledos version of the two player card of Sage and Van Dyke and it is an 8. Looking for $$cash or trade(Cobb, JJax, Ruth, etc)or a combo. This is a great card. Taking offers. Scans are available. Thanks bruce kasarda
